Functions

 EVALUATE (select__c)
 Inverse for c = select__c( s, a, b ).

Detailed Description

Logical if-then-else operator using the relation c = s ? a : b.

Chooses a if s > 0 or b otherwise.

Warning:
Use with cautoin within strongly-connected components as it might discontinuity during the Newton iteration.
Acceptable input set: a = 1.0, b = 2.0, s = 0.0

Attention:
